item.title: Aahahhahahha i pked neopets!1
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Arkanor:

It was based on a Yahoo cracker, and had four modes of cracking. The only interesting mode that let you load a password list and a username list was nonfunctional (or else neopets players make super-hard passwords to crack), so it was useless for cracking the really good accounts. Plus, it was incredibly detectable. My post above deals with the results from using it - that is firsthand experience.

I’m talking about a different program It was a private one from a forum that my friend let me join, but then banned me within a week for discussing about it on another forum.

Read full topic

item.title: Aahahhahahha i pked neopets!1
item.dc:creator: @Arkanor Arkanor
item.description:
@Arkanor wrote:

It was based on a Yahoo cracker, and had four modes of cracking. The only interesting mode that let you load a password list and a username list was nonfunctional (or else neopets players make super-hard passwords to crack), so it was useless for cracking the really good accounts. Plus, it was incredibly detectable. My post above deals with the results from using it - that is firsthand experience.

item.title: Aahahhahahha i pked neopets!1
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Yeah there used to be some program for getting neopets passwords, it was a brute forcer in a way, but worked as a stand alone program that just sent requests I suppose. It’d then egnerate a really weird text file, which you saved as some file type and it gave u a pass. Course, I didn’t steal anyone’s account, and I remember the program stopped working. It was from a priv. forum my friend let me join, and then they banned me soon after >.<

Read full topic
